<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probe_script_item"> <x_nuvo_diag_probe_script_item action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <name>Performance tab is either 0 or empty</name> <order/> <probe display_value="Clinical Devices">3a869d1393875a10052ef5cd0bba10b6</probe> <script><![CDATA[var zeroDuration = gs.getDurationDate('0 0:0:0');
var encodedQuery = 'total_unplanned_downtime=' + zeroDuration + '^ORtotal_unplanned_downtimeISEMPTY' + '^total_planned_downtime=' + zeroDuration + '^ORtotal_planned_downtimeISEMPTY' + '^total_downtime=0^ORtotal_downtimeISEMPTY' + '^total_uptime_duration=' + zeroDuration + '^ORtotal_uptime_durationISEMPTY' + '^total_uptime=0^ORtotal_uptimeISEMPTY' + '^fault_count=0^ORfault_countISEMPTY' + '^mtbf=' + zeroDuration + '^ORmtbfISEMPTY' + '^total_unplanned_business_downtime=' + zeroDuration + '^ORtotal_unplanned_business_downtimeISEMPTY' + '^total_planned_business_downtime=' + zeroDuration + '^ORtotal_planned_business_downtimeISEMPTY' + '^total_business_downtime=0^ORtotal_business_downtimeISEMPTY' + '^total_business_uptime_duration=' + zeroDuration + '^ORtotal_business_uptime_durationISEMPTY' + '^total_business_uptime=0^ORtotal_business_uptimeISEMPTY' + '^business_fault_count=0^ORbusiness_fault_countISEMPTY';
new HealthCheckProbeUtils().getRecordsCount('x_nuvo_eam_clinical_devices', encodedQuery);
]]></script> <sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probe_script_item</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>Kaloyan.Yanakov@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2025-01-17 12:25:33</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7e869d1393875a10052ef5cd0bba10cc</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Performance tab is either 0 or empty</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probe_script_item_7e869d1393875a10052ef5cd0bba10cc</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>Kaloyan.Yanakov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2025-01-17 12:25:33</sys_updated_on> <threshold>0</threshold> </x_nuvo_diag_probe_script_item> </record_update>
